name: Bot Saves Dream -html5
description:
Story: In the Future, where people can't find games on Dream the digital distribution store created by Gabe Renewal, one AI Bot stands to curate for the players and keep his world alive before people go shop somewhere else. Bot saves dream! 

Gameplay:  This game is a platform/puzzler. 

Most of the art was created by Title Pending The dialogue system has been developed by Jeremi360 And most of the coding came from Plopsis

However, what was great about this team this jam is we helped each other get to the end. 

More about dialogue system called Ren Here.

Some assets were from Kenney (i;e some graphics, sound) checkout his jam https://itch.io/jam/kenney-jam-2018

And  his free assets and licences here:

https://opengameart.org/users/kenney
